id: (FREE) Notion Daily Agenda 2021-2022 (Light & dark themes) - For habit tracking , meal planning , journaling etc..
name: (FREE) Notion Daily Agenda 2021-2022 (Light & dark themes) - For habit tracking , meal planning , journaling etc..
description: A notion template with a page for every day in 2021 & 2022. You can use it to kickstart your habit tracker, meal planner, daily journal, daily tracker, mood tracker or whatever you want.It comes in 4 variations:Week start: Sunday with light themeWeek start: Sunday with dark themeWeek start: Monday with light themeWeek start: Monday with dark themeRead more about it in my blog
features: Week start: Sunday with light theme; Week start: Sunday with dark theme; Week start: Monday with light theme; Week start: Monday with dark themeRead more about it in my blog
